title: Mala Gaonkar’s Hedge Fund Assets Hit $6 Billion in Three Years
description: Mala Gaonkar’s hedge fund tripled its assets to about $6 billion just three years after it started trading, marking one of the fastest-growing debuts in history.
content: Mala Gaonkar’s hedge fund tripled its assets to about $6 billion just three years after it started trading, marking one of the fastest-growing debuts in history.
